actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 to make unlawful a willful misrepresentation regarding a Member of Congress or Federal officer made to influence Federal, State, or local government employees in the performance of official acts.

summary.text: Establishes criminal penalties for anyone who, for the purpose of inducing a Federal, State, or local government employee to take or fail to take an action in the performace of an official function, knowingly and willfully makes a misrepresentation or false statement to the effect that a Member of Congress or Federal officer desires or seeks such action or inaction.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 to make unlawful a willful misrepresentation regarding a Member of Congress or Federal officer made to influence Federal, State, or local government employees in the performance of official acts.
